channel.title: [525] Changing port [525]
channel.description: I am trying to change the port on my 525 server, and I already changed it in Server.Java, but where else do I need to change it because when it was 43594, it would load up fine, and everything, but it would listen on my 317 server. Does anyone know where I need to change the port?

item.title: [525] Changing port [525]
item.dc:creator: @warlok warlok
item.description:
@warlok wrote:

You should only have to change it in Server.java, but make sure you load the client to the correct port when connecting.

Read full topic
